title: Develop AKS Terraform Module
description: Write Terraform code to provision AKS cluster, node pools, and VNet integration.
acceptance_criteria: Terraform plan executes cleanly; Cluster created with System/User node pools
definition_of_done: Infrastructure deployed to Dev environment; State file locked in Azure Storage
deployment_notes: Requires Global Admin for AD integration

title: Configure AKS RBAC and Namespaces
description: Set up Kubernetes namespaces (dev, stage, prod) and RBAC role bindings for AD groups.
acceptance_criteria: Namespaces created; Dev group has access to dev namespace
definition_of_done: kubectl auth can-i verifies correct permissions
business_value: Secures cluster access and isolates environments

title: Develop PostgreSQL Terraform Module
description: Write Terraform to provision Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server with PostGIS.
acceptance_criteria: Postgres Flexible Server provisioned; PostGIS extension enabled
definition_of_done: Connection verified from AKS cluster via Private Endpoint

title: Implement Passport Azure AD Strategy
description: Configure @nestjs/passport with Azure AD B2C metadata for token validation.
acceptance_criteria: Strategy validates B2C access tokens; User object injected into request
definition_of_done: Unit tests pass; Integration test with valid B2C token succeeds

title: Develop RBAC Guard and Decorator
description: Create NestJS Guard to check roles extracted from JWT claims.
acceptance_criteria: Guard denies access if role missing; 403 Forbidden returned
definition_of_done: Unit tests with mock context pass; Guard applied to test route

title: Design Product Data Model and Migration
description: Define TypeORM entity with fields and indexes for Products.
acceptance_criteria: Entity supports soft delete; Unique constraint on (Brand, SerialNumber)
definition_of_done: Migration file generated; Entity synced with DB

title: Configure WatermelonDB Schema
description: Define local database schema for Service Requests, Products, and Users.
acceptance_criteria: Database initializes on app start; Schema matches backend models
definition_of_done: App launches on simulator; DB file created

title: Implement Redis IoAdapter
description: Configure NestJS to use Redis for WebSocket pub/sub.
acceptance_criteria: WebSocket messages propagate across multiple server instances

title: Implement Product CRUD API
description: Create NestJS Controller and Service for product registration with validation.
acceptance_criteria: POST /products creates record; Validation pipe rejects missing fields
definition_of_done: Integration tests via Supertest pass; API documented

title: Implement PostGIS Spatial Queries
description: Write logic to match user location to Service Center polygons.
acceptance_criteria: Query correctly identifies service center containing a point; <100ms execution
definition_of_done: Unit tests with mock geometry data pass

title: Develop Routing Service Business Logic
description: Integrate spatial queries into NestJS service with round-robin assignment.
acceptance_criteria: Service selects correct center; Round-robin implemented
definition_of_done: Integration tests with seeded data pass

title: Create Secure Gateway and Guards
description: Implement main Gateway class with WsGuard to validate JWTs.
acceptance_criteria: Unauthenticated connections rejected; User ID attached to socket
definition_of_done: Connection test with valid/invalid tokens passes

title: Implement Synchronization Service
description: Develop sync adapter to pull changes from backend and push local changes.
acceptance_criteria: Pull sync fetches data; Push sync sends queue; Conflicts resolved
definition_of_done: Offline/Online toggle test successful; Sync logs verified
